sourcesContent:
Curso {{course.name}} Categoria {{course.category}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Course } from '../model/course'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent { courses: Course[] = [ { _id:'1', name:'Programação', category: 'TI' } ]; displayedColumns= ['name','category']; constructor(){ } ngOnIt(): void{ } }
